value.title: An overview of Azure Blueprints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Alex Frankel (@sonofdiesel) joins Scott Hanselman (@shanselman) to discuss Azure Blueprints. Environment creation can be a long and error prone process. Azure Blueprints helps you deploy and update cloud environments in a repeatable manner using composable artifacts such as policies, role-based access

value.title: An overview of Azure Data Explorer (ADX) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Manoj Raheja joins Lara Rubbelke to demonstrate Azure Data Explorer (ADX) and provide an overview of the service from provisioning to querying. ADX is a fast, fully managed data analytics service for real-time analysis on large volumes of streaming data. It brings together a highly performant and scalable

value.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 overview | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: James Baker joins Lara Rubbelke to introduce Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2, which is redefining cloud storage for big data analytics due to multi-modal (object store and file system) access and combining the best qualities of a dedicated analytics file system with those of a cloud-scale object store.

value.excerpt: Jacob Jedryszek joins Scott Hanselman to talk about about using Cognitive Services with Azure Search with your mobile and web apps. value.title: Go serverless: Big data processing with Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Working with Apache Kafka and want to simplify management of your infrastructure? value.title: Introduction to version control with Git
value.excerpt: Git is the leading version control tool and essential for developers. Learn how to leverage Git to track your own changes and collaborate with others.

topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Assess your existing software development process
value.excerpt: Find out how to assess efficiency with a value stream map to help you examine your existing release processes and technologies.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.
